item.title: 首席执行官：特朗普制裁促使中国小米进入电动汽车市场
item.description: 小米公司首席执行官雷军周五表示，特朗普政府决定在2021年初制裁中国的小米公司，是该公司决定制造其首款电动汽车的催化剂。【原文：A decision by the Trump administration to sanction China’s Xiaomi Corp in early 2021 was the catalyst for the company’s decision to build its first electric car, CEO Lei Jun said on Friday.】

item.title: 印度信实工业公司第一季度利润下降 5.5%
item.description: 印度企业集团信实工业公司周五公布的第一季度利润下降了 5.5%。【原文：Indian conglomerate Reliance Industries reported a 5.5% fall in first-quarter profit on Friday.】

item.title: 欧盟将在反倾销调查中对进口中国生物柴油征收关税
item.description: 欧盟发现中国生物柴油以不公平的低价在欧盟市场上销售，因此将对中国生物柴油征收临时关税。【原文：The European Union is set to impose provisional duties on Chinese biodiesel after finding it is being sold in EU markets at unfairly low prices.】

item.title: 截至 7 月 17 日的一周，美国股票基金吸引大量资金流入
item.description: 截至 7 月 17 日的七天里，美国股票基金吸引了大量资金流入，原因是在消费者价格降温和企业盈利强劲的情况下，市场预期美国将降息。【原文：U.S. equity funds attracted big inflows in the seven days to July 17, driven by expectations of a U.S. interest rate cut amid cooling consumer prices and robust corporate earnings.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚国家石油公司（Ecopetrol）与西方石油公司（Occidental）就收购 CrownRock 股份进行谈判
item.description: 哥伦比亚国有控股能源公司 Ecopetrol 周五表示，该公司正在与美国石油巨头西方石油公司（Occidental Petroleum）洽谈收购 CrownRock 股份的可能性。【原文：Colombia's majority state-owned energy company Ecopetrol said on Friday that it is in talks with U.S. oil major Occidental Petroleum to possibly buy a stake in CrownRock.】

item.title: 全球 IT 故障导致联邦快递网络中断
item.description: 联邦快递公司（FedEx Corp）周五表示，由于第三方软件供应商遭遇全球 IT 故障，公司整个网络面临严重破坏。【原文：FedEx Corp said on Friday it faced substantial disruptions throughout its networks due to a global IT outage experienced by a third party software vendor.】

item.title: 航空航天巨头因工厂困境重返范堡罗
item.description: 由于工厂内部危机重重，航空航天业下周将举行一年一度的庆典，但仍难以满足需求。【原文：A humbled aerospace industry holds its annual festival next week struggling to meet demand because of a crisis inside its plants.】

item.title: 美国经济接近 "转折点"，Vanguard青睐高质量信贷
item.description: 美国顶级资产管理公司先锋集团（Vanguard）在一份报告中称，相对于风险较高的高收益公司债券，先锋集团更青睐高评级公司债券，因为该公司正在寻求保护，以防借贷成本过高导致美国经济出现比预期更严重的衰退。【原文：Top U.S. asset manager Vanguard favors high-rated corporate debt over riskier high-yield companies' bonds as it seeks protection against the possibility a sharper-than-anticipated U.S. economic downturn caused by high borrowing costs, it said in a report.】

item.title: 科创之痛挥之不去，美国地区银行筑牢安全网
item.description: 地区性贷款机构第二季度财报显示，由于商业房地产（CRE）贷款恶化和高利率加剧了对违约的担忧，美国银行提高了信贷损失准备金。【原文：U.S. banks have boosted their provisions for credit losses as deteriorating commercial real estate (CRE) loans and high interest rates fuel fears of defaults, the regional lenders' second-quarter results show.】

item.title: 销量下降 15%，香槟制造商呼吁减少葡萄收成
item.description: 法国香槟酒生产商周五呼吁减少今年的葡萄收获量，因为经济不稳定导致客户勒紧裤腰带，今年上半年香槟酒的销量下降了 15%以上。【原文：France's champagne producers on Friday called for a cut in the number of grapes harvested this year after sales of the wine fell more than 15% in the first half of the year as customers tightened their belts due to an uncertain economy.】

item.title: 美国法院裁定 Booking.com 在瑞安航空刷屏案中败诉
item.description: 法庭文件显示，美国法院裁定Booking.com未经许可访问瑞安航空网站的部分内容，违反了《计算机欺诈和滥用法》。瑞安航空表示，这一裁决将有助于终止预订网站未经授权的屏幕搜刮行为。【原文：A U.S. court ruled that Booking.com violated the Computer Fraud and Abuse Act by accessing part of Ryanair's website without permission, court documents showed, a ruling the airline said would help end unauthorised screen scraping by booking sites.】

item.title: 印度教育科技巨头 Byju's 首席执行官称，如果破产，公司将面临全面停产
item.description: 教育科技巨头 Byju's 曾是印度最大的初创企业，估值达 220 亿美元，其首席执行官在路透社看到的一份法庭文件中表示，针对 Byju's 的破产程序很可能会迫使数千名员工辞职，并导致其服务全面关闭。【原文：Insolvency proceedings against ed-tech giant Byju's, once India's biggest startup valued at $22 billion, will likely force thousands of employees to quit and result in a total shutdown of its services, its CEO said in a court filing seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 据报道，全球技术中断后出现了哪些干扰？
item.description: 周五，一场似乎与网络安全公司 CrowdStrike 和微软的问题有关的全球技术故障影响了机场、航空公司、媒体和银行等行业的运营。【原文：A global tech outage that appeared to be related to issues at cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike and Microsoft on Friday affected operations in sectors including airports, airlines, media and banks.】

item.title: 全球技术故障背后的网络安全公司 CrowdStrike 是一家什么样的公司？
item.description: 周五，包括航空公司、银行和媒体在内的多个行业的公司受到了与微软 Azure 云平台和网络安全公司 CrowdStrike 软件问题有关的全球技术故障的影响。【原文：Companies across several industries including airlines, banking and media were hit on Friday by a global tech outage tied to Microsoft's Azure cloud platform and a software issue at cybersecurity firm CrowdStrike .】

item.title: CrowdStrike 首席执行官为技术故障道歉，称系统应该正在恢复 -NBC
item.description: 周五，CrowdStrike 首席执行官乔治-库尔茨（George Kurtz）为一次导致多个行业中断的全球技术故障道歉，并誓言将与所有客户合作，努力让他们的业务重新上线。【原文：CrowdStrike CEO George Kurtz apologized for a global tech failure that disrupted multiple industries on Friday, vowing to work with all of its customers as they work to get their operations back online.】

item.title: 在降息押注下，全球股票基金每周吸引第四笔资金流入
item.description: 截至 7 月 17 日的七天内，全球股票基金连续第四周吸引资金流入，这主要是受到近期数据显示通胀降温后美联储降息预期的刺激，从而推动了股市反弹。【原文：Global equity funds attracted inflows for a fourth successive week in the seven days to July 17, spurred by expectations of a Federal Reserve rate cut after recent data showed cooling inflation, fuelling a stock market rally.】

item.title: 利息收入疲软导致第五第三银行公司季度利润下滑
item.description: 周五，Fifth Third Bancorp 公布第二季度利润下降，原因是存款成本上升侵蚀了这家地区性银行的利息收入。【原文：Fifth Third Bancorp reported a fall in second-quarter profit on Friday, as costlier deposits eroded the regional lender's interest income.】

item.title: 利息收入减少导致地区金融公司季度利润下降
item.description: Regions Financial 周五公布的第二季度利润下降了 14%，原因是该贷款公司从客户支付的利息中获得的收入减少。【原文：Regions Financial reported a 14% fall in its second-quarter profit on Friday, as the lender earned less from customers' interest payments.】

item.title: 2024 年上半年亚洲外汇储备下降
item.description: 由于各国央行采取干预措施支持本国货币，亚洲的外汇储备今年有所下降，其中日本、印度尼西亚和韩国的外汇储备降幅居前。【原文：Asia's foreign reserves have dropped this year as central banks have intervened to support their currencies, with Japan, Indonesia and South Korea leading the declines.】

item.title: 中国将加大对设备升级和消费品以旧换新的支持力度
item.description: 据国家媒体周五援引内阁会议报道，中国将加大对设备升级和消费品以旧换新计划的支持力度。【原文：China will step up support for its program of equipment upgrades and consumer goods trade-ins, state media reported on Friday, citing a cabinet meeting.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称埃克森美孚向马来西亚国家石油公司出售马来西亚油气资产
item.description: 两位直接了解此事的消息人士称，埃克森美孚公司已同意将其在马来西亚的石油和天然气资产出售给国有能源公司马来西亚国家石油公司（Petronas），从而退出该公司曾占主导地位的马来西亚上游行业。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp has agreed to sell its Malaysian oil and gas assets to state energy firm Petronas, exiting the country's upstream sector where it used to be a dominant producer, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 智利地震引发中国锂市场反弹，但需求担忧依然存在
item.description: 智利主要锂产区发生强烈地震后，中国的锂价周五出现反弹，尽管对电动汽车电池中使用的金属需求日益增长的担忧拖累了锂价。【原文：China's lithium prices rebounded on Friday after a powerful earthquake hit Chile's major lithium producing region, although growing demand concerns weighed on the metal used in electric vehicle batteries.】

item.title: 消费强劲，美国运通季度利润超预期
item.description: 这家信用卡巨头周五表示，由于富裕客户在旅游、餐饮和娱乐方面持续挥霍，美国运通第二季度利润超出预期。【原文：American Express beat estimates for second-quarter profit as its wealthy customers persisted in splurging on travel, dining and entertainment, the credit card giant said on Friday.】

item.title: 微软称已修复 365 应用程序和服务故障原因
item.description: 微软周五表示，导致其 365 应用程序和服务中断的根本原因已经解决，但网络安全中断的残余影响仍在继续影响一些客户。【原文：Microsoft said on Friday that the underlying cause for outage of its 365 apps and services has been fixed, but the residual impact of cybersecurity outages are continuing to affect some customers.】

item.title: 巴宝莉新任掌门人在高端目标上面临艰难抉择
item.description: 巴宝莉的新老板约书亚-舒尔曼（Joshua Schulman）眼下面临着战略困境。【原文：Burberry's new boss Joshua Schulman faces an immediate strategy dilemma.】

item.title: Crowdstrike 表示正积极与受停电影响的客户合作
item.description: 网络安全公司 Crowdstrike 首席执行官周五表示，该公司正积极与受微软 Windows 主机单个内容更新中发现的缺陷影响的客户合作，与此同时，全球正在发生重大的技术故障。【原文：Cybersecurity firm Crowdstrike is actively working with customers impacted by a defect found in a single content update for Microsoft Windows hosts, the company's CEO said on Friday, amid an ongoing major global tech outage.】

item.title: 因国际钻井需求，SLB 季度利润超出预期
item.description: 周五，由于国际市场对钻井设备和技术的稳定需求，这家顶级油田服务供应商的第二季度利润超过了分析师的预期。【原文：SLB beat analysts' estimates for second-quarter profit on Friday, as the top oilfield services provider benefited from steady demand for its drilling equipment and technology in international markets.】

item.title: 哈里伯顿因国际业务强劲而实现季度利润增长
item.description: 油田服务公司哈里伯顿周五公布季度利润增长，主要得益于国际客户对其钻井设备和服务的稳定需求。【原文：Oilfield services firm Halliburton reported a rise in quarterly profit on Friday, helped by stable demand from international customers for its drilling equipment and services.】

item.title: 解说员：是什么导致了全球网络中断？
item.description: 周五，一场全球性的技术故障中断了多个行业的运营，航班停飞，多家广播公司被迫停播，从银行业到医疗保健系统都受到影响。【原文：A global tech failure disrupted operations across multiple industries on Friday, halting flights and forcing a number of broadcasters off-air, as the outage upended everything from banking to healthcare systems.】

item.title: 通用电气航空航天集团将投资 10 亿美元升级发动机维修车间
item.description: 通用电气航空航天集团（GE Aerospace）周五公布了一项计划，将在五年内投资超过 10 亿美元，用于扩建其全球维护、修理和大修（MRO）设施，并缩短客户的周转时间。【原文：GE Aerospace on Friday unveiled a plan to invest more than $1 billion over five years to expand its maintenance, repair, and overhaul (MRO) facilities worldwide and reduce turnaround times for its customers.】
